name: Finger Physics Free
description:
MOAR FREE FINGER FUN!

Finger Physics FREE has been downloaded over 3 MILLION times, why don’t you have it yet?

Finger Physics FREE was the #1 OVERALL APP in the US, UK, Germany and more!

****
“Finger Physics is AWESOME.” Eros Resmini, VP Openfeint

“This game is GREAT!!!!! Love it!!!!!” one of the 2000+ 5 Star User Reviews

“Bottom Line: Finger Physics is world-class game at a bargain price.” James Savage, Macworld.com
****

So what is Finger Physics FREE?

It’s 11 Stages and 99 levels of finger puzzling amazingness. It’s a word, trust us.

Features:
- 99 Levels with more added all the time (up from 27 at the initial launch)
- 7 game modes including tons of Egg levels – everyone’s favorite
- Exploding blocks
- Magnetized circles, squares and triangles
- Shapes that float and shapes that don’t

You know what the best part of Finger Physics FREE is? The updates with more levels! Since launch, Finger Physics FREE has been updated 8 TIMES with 8 additional stages and 72 levels at NO COST! The price stays the same, FREE, but the levels keep coming. Sing it with me, who else loves you like PressOK does? NO ONE!!!

Get Finger Physics today and keep it at the top of the charts where it belongs! We promise to keep the levels coming as long as you keep downloading and telling your friends.
